dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in early June, Kazhydromet forecasters just released the weather outlook for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in early June, Kazhydromet forecasters just released the weather outlook for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet forecasters have shared the weather forecast for Kazakhstan on June 10, 11, and 12.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for the 10th, 11th, and 12th, right? I saw that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for the tenth, eleventh, and twelfth, right? I saw that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet forecasters have shared the weather forecast for Kazakhstan on June 10, 11, and 12.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it looks like a southern cyclone is moving in, which is uh, bringing warmer temps and some rain to most areas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it looks like a southern cyclone is moving in, which is uh, bringing warmer temps and some rain to most areas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the coming days, Kazakhstan will be under the influence of a southern cyclone, which will bring warmer temperatures and rain: Only in the eastern regions will an anticyclone dominate, bringing mostly dry weather.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But not everywhere—the eastern regions are getting an anticyclone instead, so they'll stay dry.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But not everywhere-the eastern regions are getting an anticyclone instead, so they'll stay dry.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Only in the eastern regions will an anticyclone dominate, bringing mostly dry weather.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And the temperatures are gonna climb pretty high, like up to 25–32 degrees in the north, east, and center.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And the temperatures are gonna climb pretty high, like up to twenty five to thirty two degrees in the north, east, and center.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the daytime, temperatures will rise to 25"32ÂC in the north, east, and center, and reach 32"37ÂC in the west, south, and southeast.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's warm. But the west, south, and southeast are even hotter—they're expecting 32 to 37 degrees Celsius.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's warm. But the west, south, and southeast are even hotter-they're expecting thirty two to thirty seven degrees Celsius.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the daytime, temperatures will rise to 25"32ÂC in the north, east, and center, and reach 32"37ÂC in the west, south, and southeast.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, so if you're in Almaty or Shymkent, you might wanna, um, stay hydrated and maybe avoid being outside at peak hours.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, so if you're in Almaty or Shymkent, you might wanna, um, stay hydrated and maybe avoid being outside at peak hours.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And with the rain coming in from that cyclone, it might feel a bit muggy in those regions too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And with the rain coming in from that cyclone, it might feel a bit muggy in those regions too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. It's interesting how split the country is weather-wise though—dry in the east, wet elsewhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. It's interesting how split the country is weather-wise though-dry in the east, wet elsewhere.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the coming days, Kazakhstan will be under the influence of a southern cyclone, which will bring warmer temperatures and rain: Only in the eastern regions will an anticyclone dominate, bringing mostly dry weather.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, anticyclones versus cyclones—always creates such a contrast. Good to know if you're traveling across regions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, anticyclones versus cyclones-always creates such a contrast. Good to know if you're traveling across regions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Pack an umbrella for the west, but maybe just sunscreen if you're heading east.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Pack an umbrella for the west, but maybe just sunscreen if you're heading east.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like a plan. Thanks, Kazhydromet!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like a plan. Thanks, Kazhydromet!
